plot: After an unexpected breakup, an unassertive man is forced back into the terrifying world of the New York singles scene. His lothario best friend, with a blind spot for tact, is more than happy to aid the cause.
title: The Lifeboat
plot_es: After an unexpected breakup, an unassertive man is forced back into the terrifying world of the New York singles scene. His lothario best friend, with a blind spot for tact, is more than happy to aid the cause.
plot_en: After an unexpected breakup, an unassertive man is forced back into the terrifying world of the New York singles scene. His lothario best friend, with a blind spot for tact, is more than happy to aid the cause.
